alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 1:44PM CDT until June 12 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Central Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 144 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Many, or 22 miles west of Natchitoches, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Many, Zwolle, Florien, Provencal, Fisher, Robeline, Kisatchie, Melrose, Mount Carmel, Belmont, Bellwood, Flora, Cypress and Marthaville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
